View's code

<ng-console options="options"></ng-console>

Controller's code

// All this stuff is entirely OPTIONAL.
$scope.options = {};

// If true, console will be hidden, and will open by pressing ยบ key.
$scope.options.fixed = {{ options.fixed }};

// If true and fixed=true, console will be displayed at fullscreen when open.
$scope.options.fullscreen = {{ options.fullscreen }};

// If true and fixed=true, console will start open.
$scope.options.open = {{ options.open }};

// This number will set a custom height for the console.
$scope.options.customHeight = {{ options.customHeight }};

// This string will replace the 'ngConsole>' prefix.
$scope.options.customPrefix = {{ options.customPrefix }};

// This will load a theme at startup.
$scope.options.customTheme: {
  name: "{{ options.customTheme.name }}"
  data: {
    bg: "{{ options.customTheme.data.bg }}",
    color: "{{ options.customTheme.data.color }}",
    boldColor: "{{ options.customTheme.data.boldColor }}",
    fontfamily: "{{ options.customTheme.data.fontfamily }}",
    fontsize: {{ options.customTheme.data.fontsize }}
  },
  labels: {
    bg: "{{ options.customTheme.labels.bg }}",
    color: "{{ options.customTheme.labels.color }}",
    boldColor: "{{ options.customTheme.labels.boldColor }}"
  },
};

// This will make these commands available for users.
$scope.options.customCommands: [
  {
    name: "{{ command.name }}",
    description: "{{ command.description }}",
    params: {{ command.params }},
    action: {{ command.action.toString() }}
  },
];
